short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: helping you with all your Roblox needs, mostly trading related

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
a tool I made to help with Roblox trading

current features:
 - button on everything relating to limited items (trade inbox, trade window, and limited item resellers) to open the UUID page of an item

features to come:
 - rolimons value for items along with total value of a trade
